== MacBookPro 10,1 and Ubuntu 12.04 (Precise Pangolin) ==

----
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <style="background-color: #f9eaaf;" tablewidth="100%"> The <nowiki>[[MacBookPro|Macbook Pro]]</nowiki> 10,1 is only recently released. However, it is possible to run Ubuntu 12.04 Precise on it. For now please refer to: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2006475 <br> As always, please be especially careful to '''setup your fan control''' first. '''Especially this MBP gets hot very fast.'''
|}
----

This page aims to describe the steps needed, to fully enable all/most features of the '''15.3 (mbp 10,1) and probably other 10-th Generation MacBookPro''' (release date: June 2012) when using '''Ubuntu 12.04, Precise Pangolin'''.

<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/terminal.png]]</nowiki> You can find out what model you have by typing at the terminal:
<pre>
sudo dmidecode -s system-product-name
</pre>

If you have a different model, please go <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MactelSupportTeam/CommunityHelpPages|here]]</nowiki> and find the right wiki.

=== Overview ===
Anything not mentioned here probably already works out of the box. If not, please refer to the <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/forumdisplay.php?f=328|Ubuntu Apple Users forum]]</nowiki>.
